product_name: AveenoCalm + Restore Nourishing Oat Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganGently cleanse and hydrate skin with Aveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Oat Facial Cleanser. The face wash for sensitive skin is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and contains nourishing oat and calming feverfew.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle face wash ideal for irritated, dry skin and tested to be gentle on sensitive skinMilky gel cream cleanser lifts away dirt and impurities, leaving skin looking healthy and hydratedCalms irritated, dry facial skin with nourishing oat and calming feverfewFacial cleanser leaves sensitive skin looking healthy, cleansed, hydrated, soft, and smoothHypoallergenic formula from a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand for over 65 yearsThis cleanser is suitable for daily use as part of your regular skincare routineFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensAlcoholDyesSulfatesPhthalatesItem 2569999How To UseWet skin with lukewarm water. Massage 1-2 pumps into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry without rubbing.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Polysorbate 20, Poloxamer 188, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Flower/Leaf/Stem Juice, Sodium Hyaluronate.
how_to_use: Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage 1-2 pumps into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry without rubbing.

reviews.headline: Aveeno Facial Cleanser
reviews.comments: This cleanser is ok. It doesn't foam like my usual cleanser but I wanted to try a different brand. It would be useful for someone who has sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: I do not recommend buying products online
reviews.comments: Sadly, I feel like product quality cleanliness has gone down the drain. I bought this online since I noticed many products in store looked dirty. Sadly, I was not expecting to receive my product dirty. Overall, product is great just can't use.

reviews.headline: Sensitive Skin Friendly!
reviews.comments: As a person who has extremely reactionary, dry, acne prone skin, this cleanser saved my skin! No rashes or burning! I dont wear a lot of foundation (due to my reactions to most products) but I can attest that it takes off eye makeup and non-waterproof makeup with ease. This is not a product that lathers if that is something you look out for!non

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: Leaves my face looking super nice and glowy and plump but then dries out my face worse then before

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this :( ive been using this product for about three weeks and ive noticed so so so many blackheads on my nose

reviews.headline: Does not remove makeup well
reviews.comments: Very nice, gentle cleanser but does not remove all my makeup, especially around the eyes. I prefer a cleanser that does it all; I'm too lazy to add another step when I'm ready for bed. I do love the Aveeno Calm + Restore gel moisturizer though!

reviews.headline: Irritating and clogged pores
reviews.comments: It irritated my skin a little and gave me clogged pores. Does not clean face properly and leaves residue on skin after cleaning. Would not recommend it to anyone with sensitive skin and acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: A staple in my routine.
reviews.comments: One of my go to cleansers. I hwve rosacea and it doesn't irritate it and risnses clean which is bug thing for me.

reviews.headline: works great for me
reviews.comments: my go to cleanser, always hydrates.

reviews.headline: Made me breakout immediately
reviews.comments: I switched over to this cleanser after using a  benzoyl peroxide wash, which I ended up being allergic to, so i had to stop. Had to switch to soemthing (gentle), to lessen the irritation and i ended up breaking out immediately. There also seems to be some pore clogging ingredients in here.

reviews.headline: Gave me acne
reviews.comments: I've had clear skin all of my life as well as sensitive skin and when I started using this product I experienced an insane amount of acne, the product also made my skin barrier very weak to the point where putting on vitamic c would make my skin have a burning sensation. I have been left with acne scars all over my face as well

reviews.headline: It's fine
reviews.comments: I have extremely sentive skin and oily skin for a while it was helping but I noticed that my face was still oliy.

reviews.headline: Burning sensation
reviews.comments:
I never thought that a product that it's for sensible skin, says that calms and restore it will give me a really bad burning sensation. Unfortunately this one isn't for me :( 
I realy love the Aveeno products but this I'll pass.

reviews.headline: works like ü™Ñmagic ü™Ñ
reviews.comments:
I have sensitive skin and i aprove of thos cleanser!

-it lathers on nicely
-fragrance free
-hydrates
-doesn't leave a tight feeling

This cleanser is a must to have!!! üèÜüèÜüèÜ

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: Prefect for dry skin!!!

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: I have had so many bottles of this product it's crazy. I have sensitive acne prone skin, and it didn't help my acne go away, but it helped calm my face down from very strong face washes. I ‚ù§Ô∏è THIS FACE WASH

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments:
I've been using this and the face wash for a while now. And fully intend to continue doing so.
Sooths my skin, leaves my skin feeling so nice. Almost everything annoys my skin, these two
products are among the ones that my skin loves.

reviews.headline: It's alright
reviews.comments: This product doesn't feel like it's cleansing your skin it feels like lotion and doesn't really do much very mediocre product.

reviews.headline: burned my face
reviews.comments: 2 yeaes ago i used to use this cleanser and it saved my skin, so i bought it again recently and it burned my skin and made it red and irritated.

reviews.headline: My favorite morning cleanser
reviews.comments: This is so refreshing on the face in the morning for me, it's nice on my skin, which I love since I have sensitivities to a lot of products. This also has essentially no scent so I enjoy that too

media.headline: Good for Sensitive Skin, Lacks Lather

media.headline: Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Cleanser
media.caption: Aveeno Calm   Restore Nourishing Oat Cleanser

faceoff_positive.comments: Aveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Oat Cleanser is extremely gentle. I don't have sensitive skin but when I have used products for sensitive skin before they have left a film, almost as if I were washing my face with lotion that didn't want to come off. This had no discernable scent and washed off completely clean. My skin did not feel tight after I dried my face and was surprisingly soft.  I also read up on the ingredients because I was taken aback by the fact that it did not strip my skin, yet cleaned it. It also did not lather too much but it was very thick. The best way I can describe it: it's like a really thick serum. Again, because it rinsed clean I was certain there had to be a common surfactant in there like sodium lauryl and/or laureth sulfate. However, there are other ingredients in there that have gentler surfactant properties. All in all, I'm pleasantly surprised with Aveeno's Calm + Restore Sensitive. Takeaways, no weird smell, excellent consistency, and rinsed off clean.
faceoff_positive.headline: Effective cleanser, effective hydration

faceoff_negative.comments: I received the opportunity to try Aveeno's Calm and Restore Nourishing Oat Cleanser for sensitive skin for free in and exchange for my honest review. First and foremost the texture and consistency of the cleanser is very lotion like in my opinion, it certainly adds moisture but not having a foaming consistency in a cleanser doesn't feel affective to me. I truly don't feel like the product is actively cleaning as I use it. Though the product doesn't seem effective to me in that manner it is most definitely formulated for sensitive skin and it adds moisture and a boost of vibrancy to your face.
faceoff_negative.headline: Moisturizing cleanser
